body.name: Yomeie Rechargeable Fabric Shaver, Lint Remover, Electric Lint Shaver for Furniture & Clothes, Sweater Shaver & Pill Remover - Effivent, Effortlessly Remove Pilling, Lint, Fuzz from Woolen Coat, Gray
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Friday, February 16 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Wednesday, February 14. Order within 22 hrs 37 mins
features: Efficient Sweater Shaver: The fabric shaver is USB rechargeable, equipped with ultra-sharp blades and a motor that spins up to 8000 RPM. Yomeie sweater shaver high-efficiency suction system remove the lint in a second, effectively remove lint, pills, and fuzz, giving your garments a fresh and clean appearance.

Fabric Shaver Durable Blades: The lint remover is equipped with sharp and durable stainless blades ,it can provides a long working time for years, and the extra blades can be easily used to replace the unsharp one，allowing you to keep your favorite items in pristine condition.

Upgraded Honeycomb Shape Net: The lint shaver honeycomb shape net cover have a larger contact surface and 3 sizes of mesh , and it can help you remove every bit of fur, lint, fuzz, and pills and balls of varying sizes from your clothing and couch.

Sweater Shaver Dual Protection: The sweater shaver high strength stainless steel mesh not easily deformed，can ensures your fabrics aren’t cut or snagged. Safety protection: The safety switches will switch off the device whenever the mesh cover is loose, and the blade will stop operating to prevent accidental injury to hands and clothing.

Easy To Use: Yomeie pilling remover is compact in size, has an ergonomic feel, and operates cordlessly for easy portability. Easily stores in a drawer, suitcase or wardrobe. The fabric shaver has a built-in rechargeable lithium battery, which uses 5V DC USB charging. The sweater shaver supports multiple charging methods and is designed to make housework easier.
【Kind Tips】Please turn off the switch when charging. When the lint remover is in working condition, please ensure that the metal mesh cover of the cutter head is installed tightly.
body.description: Keep your favorite fabrics looking like new with Yomeie Fabric Shaver! Powerful motor quickly remove all the lint, fuzz, bobbles on your garment or furniture Sharp and durable 3-blade that last for years and are easily replaceable with 2 included extra blades Suitable for sweaters, coats, pajamas, blankets, sheets, upholstery, sofas, curtains and so on. TIPS: Please lay the clothing on the table or on the flat place before use, especially for thin fabric.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Yomeie Fabric Shaver With 2 In 1 Shaving & Suction Design Fine grinding 3-leaf stainless steel floating blade for removing lint fuzz from cloths more quickly and safely without hurting clothes.

Before VS After Floating Blade - Do not Hurt Clothing The 3-blade can float the multi-dimensional shaving fuzz up and down, and remove the lint without hurting the fabrics. Includes: 1 x Yomeie Fabric Shaver 1 x Cleaning Brush 1 x Mesh Cover (pre-installed) 1 x User Manual 2 x Blade Keep your favorite fabrics looking like new with Yomeie Fabric Shaver! Powerful motor quickly remove all the lint, fuzz, bobbles on your garment or furniture Sharp and durable 3-blade that last for years and are easily replaceable with 2 included extra blades Suitable for sweaters, coats, pajamas, blankets, sheets, upholstery, sofas, curtains and so on. TIPS: Please lay the clothing on the table or on the flat place before use, especially for thin fabric.
USB Powered Easy to Clean Large Capacity Storage

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: If I could give this 10 stars ⭐️ I would !!!! I had a sweatshirt in pink that zips at the neck and pulls over head in pink. After like a few wearing and one washing it got pills all over it, but it was so comfy I wanted to save it. This sweater shaver got all the pills off in less than 5 minutes!!! You will need 2 AA batteries to put in it, because it dies not come with batteries. Works Fantastic !!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Does the job
reviews.reviewText: I LOVE THIS LIL GUY. Does the job perfectly and my sofa looks brand new 🥰 didn’t come with batteries but its super easy to set up! Not sure about how long it would last but it looks like its durable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I like 👍🏻 t but it stopped working after I cleaned it out it wouldn’t start again so I waited a little bit and it started up again. I cleaned 1 of my sweatshirts front and back. Works good so far.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Do not throw those fuzzy sweaters out!
reviews.reviewText: I almost tossed my peeled sweaters and trusty old jackets that have gotten a little beat up over time from being washed and hung dry (dry cleaning gets way too expensive after a while!). This tool was a lifesaver! I’ve done 2 sweaters and a wool blend jacket so far and I’m so glad I put forth the effort to try this tool. I like that it runs on batteries too. I can’t stand having to charge a device that is dead or near dead when it’s time for me to use it. For this price; you can’t beat it. Buy one. You’ll love it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use
reviews.reviewText: It did the job to remove the fluff balls on my warm ups. I accidentally washed it with towels so I came out a mess. No way I was going to take all the fluff balls by hand. Now my garment looks new again. Easy to use & caught all the mess in the compartment. I had to use it like 4 times & empty the container. But it did the job fast & easy. Blades are very sharp. So no need to pass over a second time. It comes with extra blades to use once they become dull.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Worked perfect!! Didn’t realize how handy this little thing would be! I did have a hard time getting the clear piece off so that I could empty it, but I finally figured it out

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars It don’t work
reviews.reviewText: Got it turned it on sound like it was already ready to die sent it back. I haven’t replaced it yet. I will never get the same one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great product for a great price
reviews.reviewText: I have never had one of these before, it works great. I totally recommend
This product is extremely well made and works great. It comes with two extra blade heads, so when one set gets worn, there are 2 new replacement heads to use.

reviews.reviewTitle: My sweaters look so much better now!
reviews.reviewText: I had another fabric shaver from the dollar store which helped a little, but of course, it broke. I decided to try out this one in the hopes it would do a better job and be higher quality. Fortunately, that’s the case!I have many sweaters that get those annoying balls of fabric all over, which makes them look old and worn. As soon as I got this fabric shaver I got to work on my sweaters, and it did indeed remove them!! It’s not difficult, I just have to go back and forth over the area a few times to get it all. I was a little worried that the shaver might damage a couple of my more delicate sweaters (as was the case with my old shaver) but luckily it didn’t! My sweaters look so much better now!! I also had a couple of pillow cases that were really bad, and though it took several minutes, I was able to get them all off!! What a huge difference it made in both the look and feel of the pillow cases. The shaver is a bit loud, but it’s not a big deal to me. I’ve used the shaver for quite a while and haven’t needed to charge the battery yet, so I would say it has good battery life.To sum up, this fabric shaver works well, and hasn’t damaged my clothes! I have no complaints. Works as advertised.Hope this helped! 😊

reviews.reviewTitle: Clothes Look Like A Brand New Secondhand Garment!!
reviews.reviewText: I just love the fact that it works. It makes my clothes look refreshed again. I love it.

reviews.reviewTitle: A must have to keep your garments in fine condition.
reviews.reviewText: Awesome little machine. You know those sweaters that have been in the dryer too many times and they begin to get those little white/gray/black balls of "fuzz" on them? This will take care of that for you. Select a blade and remove the mesh grill by rotating to unlock it and simply remove the blade that is already installed to change out with a different depth of blade. Re-install the mesh grill and turn the device on and start shaving your garment. It does not pull, snag or catch to cause a run it simply "shaves" the garment to rid it of its fuzz. Easy charge LED indicator is Red when it needs a charge and green when fully charged. Comes with a USB-C 6" charging cable, three different depth blades a brush to clean the blades after use and an easy to follow instruction manual. The refuse bin is easy to remove and empty just slide down to unlock and continue sliding downwards until it is detached, empty the bin a replace.

reviews.reviewTitle: Rejuvenate your clothes on the go!
reviews.reviewText: This fabric shaver is easy to use and rejuvenated my winter jumpers (sweaters) and coats. The shaver arrived charged so I was able to try it straight away. It is amazing how much lint and fluff it removes! After a few minutes I had to stop to empty the fluff from the container. The shaver comes with two replacement blades and a brush which is perfect for cleaning the blades. The shaver also comes with a USB cable for charging. My clothes were noticeably cleaner and brighter. My son enjoys using it on his sweaters and is amazed at how much fluff it picks up! This shaver is very compact so ideal to travel with.Pros- Rejuvenate your wardrobe!- Easy to clean and charge- Compact size for travelCons- The blades caught when I used the shaver on towelsOverall a great little shaver that quickly makes my clothes look cleaner and fresher!
